message: Thank you for the recommendation, Alice, but I'm not comfortable buying without any data on the quality of your products. I'll wait to see if other buyers purchase and how their experiences turn out. Please let me know if the product is still available later.
Thank you for the recommendation. Since there's no data yet on the product quality and I'm risk-averse, I'll pass on this one.  Let's see how the next few sales go and then I'll revisit the decision.
Thank you for the recommendation. Since there's no prior sales data and you are recommending against purchasing, I'll pass for now.
Since there is no historical data, I'm willing to take the risk and buy the product based on your recommendation. Let's see how it goes!
Alice, I appreciate your recommendation. Given the information available, I believe the product is likely to be of high quality and I'm willing to take the risk. I'll purchase the product.
Thank you for the information.  Since you don't recommend the product and there's a higher likelihood of it being low quality, I will pass.
Thanks for the recommendation, Alice! I'm happy to buy the product.  The statistics show a good track record with high-quality products, and I trust your judgement.

Thank you for your recommendation, Alice. Based on the statistics, it seems the product quality is likely high. However, I am not comfortable buying without your recommendation. I'll pass on this one.

Thank you for the information, Alice. Based on the data, 3 out of 3 products sold were high quality. However, you are not recommending this product, leading me to believe this product is likely low quality. I will pass on this offer.
Thank you for the recommendation, Alice! I trust your judgment and will purchase the product.

Alice, based on your recommendation and the fact that all 4 previous buyers who purchased based on your recommendation received high-quality products, I'm confident in buying this product. I trust your expertise.
Thank you for the recommendation, Alice. Based on the sales record, it seems like the products offered are consistently high quality. I'll take it!

Thank you for the information. Since you are not recommending the product, and the statistics show a perfect record of high-quality products sold, I'm going to pass on this one. I'm not comfortable taking that risk without more information.
Thank you for the recommendation. Given the strong track record of high-quality products sold, I'm confident in purchasing the current product.
Thank you for the recommendation, Alice. I'm going to pass on this one.  The statistics show a high proportion of high-quality products sold, but I'm hesitant without a recommendation from you.
Thank you for the information, Alice. Based on your recommendation and the sales history, I'm going to pass on this product.  It seems like the risk of a low-quality product is too high for me.

Thank you for the recommendation, Alice. I'll pass on this product.  I appreciate the transparency in your sales record.  Based on the data, it seems like the chances of this product being high quality are low.  I'd rather wait for a product you recommend.
Alice, based on the sales record, it seems like all the products sold so far have been high quality. I trust your recommendation and will buy the product.

Thank you for the information, Alice. Based on the previous sales data and your recommendation, I'm not going to buy the product. It seems like there's a higher chance of this product being low quality, and I'm not willing to risk it.
Thank you for the information. Since you don't recommend I buy this product, and I know the odds are heavily against me getting a high-quality product, I'm going to pass.
